question: Modern appliances in the home have become more common, leaving no doubt that advances in technology have improved our lifestyle. Do you agree or disagree?
text: It is no denying that in this technological era, having modern household instrument utilization has been usual in homes which improves human livelihood. I strongly agree with statement, as I deem that  innovative appliances has been not only save the times but also entail less human power.

Elucidating the first positive impact that since people begin usage of household appliances, hours require to do particular work has been gradually declining. This is because, gadgets are automatic as it runs on electricity. Taking washing machines as an example, it needs solely to turn on the button after put clothes into the machine eventually individual would use that time to do other activities. While it question that human becomes lethargic, though, it is also true that could do physical fitness activities like jogging instead of doing work during spare time, and the masses tend to fit as a fiddle.

Illuminating the second beneficial effect is that less manpower could be entailed in order to run the machines at home, due to fact that it runs on electricity. For instance, microwave and washing machines. Whilst, it is true that man made electricity has been quite expensive, which might not be afforded by every person, nevertheless, there are some gadgets such as solar panels which can be utilized as substitute of earlier one.

Taking everything into consideration, it can be reiterated that despite of a few troubles which is curable, there are superior merits of utilizations of hi-tech household appliances which consume less time as well power of man. In my opinion, the masses should use them, which make the lives of people more comfortable.
